segments.text: Here . Do you have a registration card ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please register your information here and pay for it . And I ’ ll make a medical record for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . How much do I need to pay for the registration ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please pay ten yuan for the registration .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is your registration card . Please don ’ t lose it and bring it whenever you come .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I will . But can you tell me how to get to the consulting room ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Go down this way until you come to the drugstore . Make a left turn and it's just there .
segments.speaker: S2
